column5: I can#t go against KVD again this year , maybe Evers.  Water is still colder then normal so I have a feeling it will play out alot like last yeaars classic with guys trying to stay on a spot all day where active fish move by. Crankbaits to get the larger fish to bite. Its all aboout fishing first not second!  That is my strategy, I wonder if I will be close!!LOL   Darren
I think your strategy should be to look after your own team in the tourney.
KVD also, lots of talk about Edwin Evers & Ott Defoe though
I am sneaking KVD on too my team shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh
The guy with the most big fish.

Aaron is one of my favorites. I hope he wins , but KVD is just so good , its a river , anyones guess .. GO AaRon go ... Shaw Grigsby is my ALL TIME fav .. If you get a chance read his book , great fisherman great family man ,just a person you should pattern your life after , after reading his book had a great influence on my life as a pro fishermen , but he is not a river guy !!! Sorry Shaw not your year ...
